feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature rising to 8 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
